pre_caption: This video offers a dizzying, first-person perspective looking down a very tall, narrow shaft, resembling a stairwell or an elevator shaft. The walls are a neutral, light color, accented by rectangular light fixtures. The rapid downward motion creates a significant blur, with details like a poster and an exit sign becoming visible at the bottom.
